name: nyx-chat
description: Revolutionary chat application with AI-powered features and stunning UI

scripts.build: npm run server:build && npm run client:build
scripts.test: npm run server:test && npm run client:test
scripts.lint: npm run server:lint && npm run client:lint
scripts.lint:fix: npm run server:lint:fix && npm run client:lint:fix
scripts.format: npm run server:format && npm run client:format
scripts.clean: npm run server:clean && npm run client:clean
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run client:install && npm run server:install
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build && npm run deploy:staging:server
scripts.deploy:production: npm run build && npm run deploy:production:server
scripts.security:audit: npm audit && cd client && npm audit && cd ../server && npm audit
scripts.security:fix: npm audit fix && cd client && npm audit fix && cd ../server && npm audit fix
scripts.update:deps: npm update && cd client && npm update && cd ../server && npm update
scripts.analyze:bundle: cd client && npm run build && npx webpack-bundle-analyzer build/static/js/*.js
scripts.analyze:server: cd server && npm run build && npx webpack-bundle-analyzer dist/bundle.js
scripts.docs:generate: typedoc --out docs/api server/src && cd client && npm run docs:generate
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: npm version major && git push && git push --tags
scripts.precommit: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.prepush: npm run build && npm run test
